channel.title: [Czar]Wilderness Teleporting[Czar]

item.title: [Czar]Wilderness Teleporting[Czar]
item.dc:creator: @gangsta_tony gangsta tony
item.description:
@gangsta_tony wrote:

Well I see my players on my server, teleporting in wild when they’re about to die. I tried fixing it but it didn’t work.

if(isInWilderness()) { sM("You cannot teleport while you're in wilderness!"); if (inWilderness()) { sM("You can't teleport out of the Wilderness!"); return; }

Read full topic
